Name: team_size_minimum
Description: Ensure minimum team size for effective Scrum

Name: worker_availability_requirement
Description: Ensure workers are available for assigned tasks

Name: sprint_duration_constraint
Description: Ensure sprint duration is within acceptable limits

Name: blocker_resolution_time
Description: Ensure blockers are resolved within acceptable time

Name: feature_priority_constraint
Description: Ensure high-priority features are addressed first

Name: user_story_points_constraint
Description: Ensure user stories have appropriate story points

Name: task_effort_constraint
Description: Ensure task efforts are within acceptable limits

Name: skill_level_requirement
Description: Ensure workers have required skill levels

Name: stakeholder_influence_constraint
Description: Consider stakeholder influence in decision making

Name: team_satisfaction_threshold
Description: Ensure team satisfaction is above threshold

Name: epic_completion_rate
Description: Ensure epics are completed at acceptable rate

Name: user_story_completion_rate
Description: Ensure user stories are completed at acceptable rate
